parameters: Text = "A stick? That's all you got?"

parameters.text: "If you don't want it, you can fight with your\nbare hands."

parameters: Text = "If you don't want it, you can fight with your\nbare…

parameters.text: "Eh? This can't be a regular rat?!"

parameters: Text = "Eh? This can't be a regular rat?!"

parameters.text: "Why are all these stupid\ncreatures so big now!"

parameters: Text = "Why are all these stupid\ncreatures so big now!"
Text = "Hey spidies! Leave the cat alone!"

parameters.text: "So this is how you repay me, \\N[4]."

parameters: Text = "So this is how you repay me, \\N[4]."

parameters.text: "I'm the only one who understands you!"

parameters: Text = "I'm the only one who understands you!"

parameters.text: "Go ahead and try out\nyour new found powers."

parameters: Text = "Go ahead and try out\nyour new found powers."
\tgt[a3]You see? Should be feeling better in time.
\tgt[a3]You learned to breathe fire, I see.
\tgt[a1]It's unreal... How is this even possible!
\tgt[a3]Wow, already learned to make your own moves.
\tgt[a1]Yeah, maybe I got a knack for magic!
\tgt[a3]I like that, helping out the team.
But I suppose this could help, hehe.
\tgt[a3]Oh? I didn't expect that from you, \N[2].

parameters.text: "I'm sorry \\N[1], but we can't let you do this."

parameters: Text = "I'm sorry \\N[1], but we can't let you do this."

parameters.text: "You're not by brother! You're a fakie!"

parameters: Text = "You're not by brother! You're a fakie!"

parameters.text:
"\N[6]'s magical influence
has gone out of control.
I think that's why she's
calling for me."

parameters: Text = "\\N[6]'s magical influence\nhas gone out of control…

parameters.text: "Stop talking! We got skeletons in front of us!\nReady to slice us!"

parameters: Text = "Stop talking! We got skeletons in front of us!\nRea…
Text = "Eew! Why were there spidies there!"
Text = "No... the soil isn't ripe yet..."

parameters.text: "I give up...\nYou may have my dirt."
